references.tips.p1: To make your reference easier to find, add a title that is small but describes your reference accurately.
references.tips.p2: To explain your reference further more, add a few more details in the description.
references.tips.p3: Add the book title and its author as they appear in your book.
about.vision.p1: Searching books by their content is a hard job.
about.vision.p2: Google has been indexing books for years by physically scanning their content. Complex algorithms allow the users to type something on their browser and get results that could match the content of these books.
about.vision.p3: This is great, but this is Google. We can't do that! And that's why we rely solely on you, the users!
about.vision.p4: The purpose of this website is to offer a free service for searching books based on references that were created by the users. A reference is simply a note taken upon reading a book, accompanied by a link to the title and the page of the book. The more references we have, the more results you get!
about.vision.p5: Read a book, publish your favorite highlights and let the rest of the world know where to find them!
about.vision.p6: Join us and let's have this journey together!
about.whoweare.p1: We are a small team of... one developer. We are trying constantly to improve your experience with our website, but we ask for your patience since we might not respond in a lightning fast manner.
about.whoweare.p2: We are open minded and welcome any suggestions. Feel free to contact us and we will do our best to bring your ideas in your screen!
about.contribute.p1: You can contribute to our cause by signing in and making a request to 'Join us'. Once your request is approved, you will be able to add your own references in our database.
about.contribute.p2: There are no commitments of any sort. You can simply create your new references whenever you feel like or the next time you read an awesome book.
contact.title: Contact Information
contact.p1: You can get in touch using the messenger support chat icon at the bottom right of your screen.
contact.p2.a: You can also contact us via email, using the address below, or simply by clicking
contact.p2.c: to open your default email client.
contact.p3: Thank you for your understanding and we do apologize for any inconvenience.
home.firstrow.left.title: What?
home.firstrow.left.text: A search engine for books related to the information you desire
home.firstrow.right.title: More?
home.firstrow.right.text: A free service, powered by its users, through the creation of references
home.secondrow.title: How?
home.secondrow.text: Simply, type what you are looking for and we'll try to find you some books!
home.third.title: Join Us!
home.third.p1: Do you want to go further?
home.third.p2: Sign in and request to become an author so that you can create your own references and share them with the rest of the world.
home.fourth.title: Ready to search?
home.fourth.p1: Navigate to the Search menu at the top of your screen.
home.fourth.p2: Additionaly, Sign In with one of your favorite providers to access extra features such as adding your own bookmarks and rating references!
